Articles.Content: I have been playing KSP for years, then it dawned on me, there is a a KSP forum... I have still yet to land on Minmus or The Mun, and I am still watching tutorials with no progress...

Welcome to the forum again! 

I'm sure you will find a helpful and friendly community here so please don't be shy about asking questions.
There's no hurry. As long as you're having fun.
